mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.qyid qyid, t.cplx cplx, t.cpjj cpjj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, t.src src
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM CFPA_QY_CPJS t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name cplxmc, c4.code_name cplxmc_ENG FROM CFPA_QY_CPJS t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'CPLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.cplx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'CPLX_EN' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.cplx = c4.CODE_VALUE Left Join CFPA_QY_JBXX jj on jj.qyid=t.qyid
WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and jj.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.qyid is not null
ORDER BY t.cjsj ASC

SELECT , c2.code_name cplxmc, qj.zwgsmc,qj.ywgsmc FROM CFPA_QY_CPJS t Left Join CFPA_QY_JBXX qj on qj.qyid = t.qyid And qj.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'CPLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.cplx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.UUID = #{value}

FROM CFPA_QY_CPJS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
